languages.text: Gives an aoe attack for the shield bash attack. And additional {uip|Damage|72daed61122d40f4a451413e9ca2f610} bonus damage on shield attack.

traits.locale_text: Gives an aoe attack for the shield bash attack. And additional {uip|Damage|72daed61122d40f4a451413e9ca2f610} bonus damage on shield attack.

languages.text: The wearer can use {g|f:b7113e32083d4344ad172d296119d40c}Shield Swing{/g} with their shield against multiple enemies in the area. The wearer's shield attacks deal an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} damage.
languages.original_text: Если у персонажа в руке щит, он может применять {g|f:b7113e32083d4344ad172d296119d40c}Размашистый удар щитом{/g} против нескольких противников в области действия. Его атаки щитом наносят +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} урона дополнительно.

traits.locale_text: The wearer can use {g|f:b7113e32083d4344ad172d296119d40c}Shield Swing{/g} with their shield against multiple enemies in the area. The wearer's shield attacks deal an additional +{uip|Damage|72daed61122d40f4a451413e9ca2f610} damage.

languages.text: 装备者可以使用{g|f:b7113e32083d4344ad172d296119d40c}盾牌横扫{/g}，攻击目标区域内的所有敌人。此外，装备者的盾牌攻击造成的伤害提高{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}。
languages.original_text: The wearer can use {g|f:b7113e32083d4344ad172d296119d40c}Shield Swing{/g} with their shield against multiple enemies in the area. The wearer's shield attacks deal an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} damage.

traits.locale_text: 装备者可以使用{g|f:b7113e32083d4344ad172d296119d40c}盾牌横扫{/g}，攻击目标区域内的所有敌人。此外，装备者的盾牌攻击造成的伤害提高{uip|Damage|72daed61122d40f4a451413e9ca2f610}。

languages.text: L'utilisateur peut asséner {g|f:b7113e32083d4344ad172d296119d40c}Volée de bouclier{/g} à plusieurs ennemis dans la zone. Les attaques qu'il porte avec son bouclier infligent +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} points de dégâts supplémentaires.
languages.original_text: The wearer can use {g|f:b7113e32083d4344ad172d296119d40c}Shield Swing{/g} with their shield against multiple enemies in the area. The wearer's shield attacks deal an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} damage.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur peut asséner {g|f:b7113e32083d4344ad172d296119d40c}Volée de bouclier{/g} à plusieurs ennemis dans la zone. Les attaques qu'il porte avec son bouclier infligent +{uip|Damage|72daed61122d40f4a451413e9ca2f610} points de dégâts supplémentaires.

languages.text: El portador puede usar {g|f:b7113e32083d4344ad172d296119d40c}Impacto de escudo{/g} con su escudo contra varios enemigos en la zona. Los ataques con escudo del portador infligen +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} de daño adicional.
languages.original_text: The wearer can use {g|f:b7113e32083d4344ad172d296119d40c}Shield Swing{/g} with their shield against multiple enemies in the area. The wearer's shield attacks deal an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} damage.

traits.locale_text: El portador puede usar {g|f:b7113e32083d4344ad172d296119d40c}Impacto de escudo{/g} con su escudo contra varios enemigos en la zona. Los ataques con escudo del portador infligen +{uip|Damage|72daed61122d40f4a451413e9ca2f610} de daño adicional.

languages.text: 使用者はシールドで範囲内の複数の敵に対して{g|f:b7113e32083d4344ad172d296119d40c}シールドスイング{/g}を使用できる。シールド攻撃は追加で+{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}ダメージを与える。
languages.original_text: The wearer can use {g|f:b7113e32083d4344ad172d296119d40c}Shield Swing{/g} with their shield against multiple enemies in the area. The wearer's shield attacks deal an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} damage.

traits.locale_text: 使用者はシールドで範囲内の複数の敵に対して{g|f:b7113e32083d4344ad172d296119d40c}シールドスイング{/g}を使用できる。シールド攻撃は追加で+{uip|Damage|72daed61122d40f4a451413e9ca2f610}ダメージを与える。

languages.text: Takan kişi, alandaki birden fazla düşmana karşı kalkanıyla {g|f:b7113e32083d4344ad172d296119d40c}Kalkan Savuruşu{/g} yapabilir. Takan kişinin kalkan saldırıları, ilave +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} hasar verir.

traits.locale_text: Если у персонажа в руке щит, он может применять {g|f:b7113e32083d4344ad172d296119d40c}Размашистый удар щитом{/g} против нескольких противников в области действия. Его атаки щитом наносят +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} урона дополнительно.
